00025 namespace AK
00026 {
00027     struct Hash32
00028     {
00029         typedef unsigned int HashType;
00030         static inline unsigned int Bits() {return 32;}
00031         static inline HashType Prime() {return 16777619;}
00032         static const HashType s_offsetBasis = 2166136261U;
00033     };
00034     
00035     struct Hash30 : public Hash32
00036     {
00037         static inline unsigned int Bits() {return 30;}
00038     };
00039     
00040     struct Hash64
00041     {
00042         typedef unsigned long long HashType;
00043         static inline unsigned int Bits() {return 64;}
00044         static inline HashType Prime() {return 1099511628211ULL;}
00045         static const HashType s_offsetBasis = 14695981039346656037ULL;
00046     };
00047 
00048     template <class HashParams> 
00049     class FNVHash
00050     {
00051     public:
00052         inline FNVHash( typename HashParams::HashType in_uBase = HashParams::s_offsetBasis );   
00053 
00057         inline typename HashParams::HashType Compute( const void* in_pData, unsigned int in_dataSize );
00058         inline typename HashParams::HashType Get() const { return m_uHash; }
00059 
00060     private:
00061         typename HashParams::HashType m_uHash;
00062     };
00063 
00064     #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00065     #pragma warning(push)
00066     #pragma warning(disable:4127)
00067     #endif
00068 
00069 
00070     template <class HashParams> 
00071     FNVHash<HashParams>::FNVHash( typename HashParams::HashType in_uBase )
00072         : m_uHash( in_uBase )
00073     {
00074     }
00075 
00076 
00077     template <class HashParams> 
00078     typename HashParams::HashType FNVHash<HashParams>::Compute( const void* in_pData, unsigned int in_dataSize )
00079     {
00080         const unsigned char* pData = (const unsigned char*) in_pData;
00081         const unsigned char* pEnd = pData + in_dataSize;        /* beyond end of buffer */
00082 
00083         typename HashParams::HashType hval = m_uHash;
00084 
00085         // FNV-1 hash each octet in the buffer
00086         while( pData < pEnd ) 
00087         {
00088             hval *= HashParams::Prime(); // multiply by the 32 bit FNV magic prime mod 2^32
00089             hval ^= *pData++; // xor the bottom with the current octet
00090         }
00091 
00092         m_uHash = hval;
00093 
00094         // XOR-Fold to the required number of bits
00095         if( HashParams::Bits() >= sizeof(typename HashParams::HashType) * 8 )
00096             return hval;
00097 
00098         typename HashParams::HashType mask = static_cast<typename HashParams::HashType>(((typename HashParams::HashType)1 << HashParams::Bits())-1);
00099         return (typename HashParams::HashType)(hval >> HashParams::Bits()) ^ (hval & mask);
00100     }
00101 
00102     #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00103     #pragma warning(pop)
00104     #endif
00105 
00106     typedef FNVHash<Hash32> FNVHash32;
00107     typedef FNVHash<Hash30> FNVHash30;
00108     typedef FNVHash<Hash64> FNVHash64;
00109 
00110 }

00112 #endif
